requirements.summary: Remove the CertificationsGallery component import and render from the main App.tsx component
acceptanceCriteria: The import statement for CertificationsGallery is removed from frontend/src/App.tsx
The <CertificationsGallery /> component render call is removed from the JSX
The application compiles without errors after the removal

file_operations.description: Remove the import statement for CertificationsGallery from the imports section and remove the <CertificationsGallery /> component from the JSX render sequence between the Interests section and Footer

requirements.summary: Delete the CertificationsGallery.tsx component file from frontend/src/components/
acceptanceCriteria: No references to CertificationsGallery remain in the codebase

file_operations.description: Delete the CertificationsGallery component file that displays 37 certification images in a responsive grid with modal integration

requirements.summary: Delete the CertificateModal.tsx component file from frontend/src/components/
acceptanceCriteria: No references to CertificateModal remain in the codebase

file_operations.description: Delete the CertificateModal component file that provides full-screen modal viewing functionality for certification images
